detail_desc: Cropped trousers in pleated jersey containing glittery threads. Regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Short, padded velour jacket with a high stand-up collar and zip down the front. Beaded appliqué on one sleeve, welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Metal earrings with a hoop and oval pendant. Diameter approx. 2.8 cm, length approx. 4 cm.

Jacket for a dog in soft pile with a foldover collar and opening for a leash at the back of the neck. Decorative tab with buttons at the top, and two hook and loop tabs at the bottom. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs that help to keep the jacket in place. Pattern-knit lining.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with sections in a double layer of woven fabric on the hood and sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with a drawstring, and a taped zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with a mesh section and elastication at the cuffs. Large side pockets with a concealed zip in the side seams. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
Jacket in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bikini briefs in cotton and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Straight-cut top in sequined mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Jersey lining.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with small pendants. Adjustable length approx. 37-45 cm.
Fitted skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif. Round neckline, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif at the top and long sleeves. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Halterneck body in jersey with gentle draping at the top and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Low-cut back and a lower section in glossy jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims. Round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and short sleeves.
Hair clips in metal decorated with beads.
Short top in light sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves and an embroidered motif.

Set with a T-shirt and skirt in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim. Skirt with an all-over print, elastication and a frill trim at the waist, and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the boxer shorts is organic.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton and viscose blend with a collar, buttons down the front and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey. Short balloon sleeves in woven fabric with a jersey lining and concealed elastication at the hems for added volume.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft, fine cotton blend with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Popover jacket in a printed weave with a fleece-lined stand-up collar, zip at the top, concealed front pocket with a zip and zipped side pockets. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, chunky knit with a polo neck and low dropped shoulders.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in scuba fabric with a low waist.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening and soft, imitation leather soles.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Push-up bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Small opening at the front, a wide trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length, dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and gentle drape. 3/4-length sleeves with a drawstring, and a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Cap in cotton denim with an embroidered motif on the front and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and at the crotch. One patterned and one in a solid colour.
Shorts in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and back pockets.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dress in light sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs.

Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and frill-trimmed yoke with inset lace trims. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and concealed, narrow elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, ribbed top in patterned cotton with a round neckline and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastic at the hem and fastener at the front.
Short, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with detachable ties, gathers in the sides for best fit and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in chiffon crêpe with inset lace trims, an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Handbag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Lined. Size approx. 13x20x29 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket regular fit trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs, two with a pendant. Adjustable length, 38-46 cm.

Set in soft cotton jersey. Top with short, lace butterfly sleeves, a pleat at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Elasticated hairband with a decorative knot.

Set containing nine earrings and two ear cuffs in metal. Five pieces are decorated with glass rhinestones. Three of the earrings are hoops with small pendants. The zinc and brass content are recycled.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems. Front pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and decorative pocket flaps at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Knitted cotton jumper with a reflective print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck and button placket. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Set in soft, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Nylon windbreaker with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Fleece lining.
Longjohns in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in a linen and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with and elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.

5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and decorative studs at the top. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and zip fly and button.
Hoodie in soft fleece jersey with a faux shearling-lined hood, decorative drawstring at the top and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Joggers in washed denim made from organic cotton and Tencel™ lyocell. Elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Lined triangle bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length, empire-line dress in soft velour with elastication at the top. Short, elasticated puff sleeves that can be worn in several different ways with an organza lining for added stability and volume. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Hair set with two hair clips in grosgrain-covered metal and two hair elastics. All with padded glittery appliqués. Length of hair clips 4 cm.
Jumper in a light, fine, soft knit with long sleeves, raw edges and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
